alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Greene; Montgomery; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 8:48PM EDT until July 17 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Warren County in southwestern Ohio... Northwestern Clinton County in southwestern Ohio... Southwestern Greene County in west central Ohio... Southeastern Montgomery County in west central Ohio... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 847 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Waynesville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Kettering, Beavercreek, Xenia, Lebanon, Bellbrook, Waynesville, Wilberforce, Clarksville, Harveysburg, Spring Valley, Corwin, Centerville, Fort Ancient, Lytle, Mount Holly, Oakland, Genntown, Caesar Creek State Park, Kingman and Greene County Airport. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 34 and 48. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
